metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7642 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The swap_std_reloc_in function in aoutx.h in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.30, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (aout_32_swap_std_reloc_out NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by objcopy.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
